mapper.insert: insert into diary (year, month, day, meal, time, kind) values (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{meal}, #{time}, #{kind})
mapper.update: update diary set year=#{year}, month=#{month}, day=#{day}, meal=#{meal}, time=#{time}, kind=#{kind} WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from diary where year=#{year} and month=#{month} and day=#{day}
